yesrestart.translation:
<:Solyx:560809141766193152> **| You have been reset!**
You can now use `{}begin` again!

description.translation: May I ask you what race you want to be?

demon.translation: Evil creatures made out of pure anger

elf.translation: Mythical and cute creatures who will beat the shit out of anything

orc.translation: Barbarian creatures made out of pure strength

archer.translation: Precise and long ranged damage, chance on critical strike

knight.translation: Tanky class with close combat damage reduction

mage.translation: Long ranged average damage class with epic items

thief.translation: The most risky class with close ranged high damage

author.translation: Where would you like to travel?

title.translation: Type a location number in the chat.

footer.translation: You can unlock new locations by leveling up!

title.translation: Are you sure you want to reforge this item?

footer.translation: Use {}vote again to claim your reward.

{} Hours, {} Minutes, and {} Seconds

nopotions.translation: <:Solyx:560809141766193152> | You don't have any healing potions!

footer.translation: Use '{}hp buy' to buy healing potions

title.translation: What title you like to select?

description.translation:
• To start playing, use `{0}begin`. The bot will ask you a few very important questions that will influence the rest of your journey. You can use this command again if you ever want to restart.

• Type `{0}fight` to start your first fight. You will only have one skill to begin with. You learn more skills as you level up.

• If you are low on health, use `{0}rest` to gain a bit of health or `{0}heal` to consume a healing potion.

• To buy and sell items, type `{0}market`. You can buy all kinds of items there. You can buy health potions using `{0}buy hp`.
Would you like to fight it?

run2.translation: :runner: **| You flee as you cower in fear...**
